description:
The Item properties element set consists of properties representing attributes and relationships of the RDA *Item* entity.

Version: 5.0.12

P40001.label: has identifier for item
P40001.description: Relates an item to a nomen that is an appellation of item that consists of a code, number, or other string, usually independent of natural language and social naming conventions, used to identify an item.

P40002.label: has item-specific carrier characteristic of early printed resource (Deprecated)
P40002.description: Relates an item to a characteristic that applies to the carrier or carriers of the specific early printed item being described and is assumed not to apply to other items exemplifying the same manifestation. includes rubrication, illumination, and other hand colouring, manuscript additions, and binding. (Deprecated)

P40003.label: has modification of item
P40003.description: Relates an item to a modification that is specific to an item and is assumed not to apply to other items exemplifying the same manifestation.

P40004.label: has collector agent (Deprecated)
P40004.description: Relates an item to an agent who is a curator who brings together items from various sources that are arranged, described, or catalogued as a collection.

P40005.label: has collection registrar agent (Deprecated)
P40005.description: Relates an item to an agent who is a curator who lists or inventories items in a collection aggregate. (Deprecated)

P40006.label: has depositor agent
P40006.description: Relates an item to an agent who is a current owner of an item who deposits the item into the custody of another agent without transferring ownership.

P40007.label: has donor agent
P40007.description: Relates an item to an agent who is a former owner of an item who donates the item to another owner.

P40008.label: has seller agent
P40008.description: Relates an item to an agent who is a former owner of an item who sells the item to another owner.

P40009.label: is contained in item
P40009.description: Relates an item to an item that is a larger item of which an item is a discrete component.

P40010.label: has note on dimensions of item
P40010.description: Relates an item to a note on item that provides information on the dimensions of an item.

P40011.label: has note on extent of item
P40011.description: Relates an item to a note on item that provides information on the extent of an item.

P40012.label: has illuminator agent
P40012.description: Relates an item to an agent who decorates a specific item using precious metals or colour, often with elaborate designs and motifs.

P40013.label: has binder agent
P40013.description: Relates an item to an agent who binds an item.

P40014.label: has inscriber
P40014.description: Relates an item to a person who writes a statement of dedication or gift on an item.

P40015.label: has annotator
P40015.description: Relates an item to a person who adds notes and other information to an item by hand.

P40016.label: has autographer
P40016.description: Relates an item to a person whose manuscript signature appears on an item.

P40017.label: has curator agent (Deprecated)
P40017.description: Relates an item to an agent who conceives or manages the aggregation of an item in an exhibition or collection. (Deprecated)

P40018.label: has current owner agent
P40018.description: Relates an item to an agent who has current legal possession of an item.

P40019.label: has former owner agent
P40019.description: Relates an item to an agent who has former legal possession of an item.

P40020.label: has custodian agent
P40020.description: Relates an item to an agent who has legal custody of an item.

P40021.label: has owner agent
P40021.description: Relates an item to an agent who has current or former legal possession of an item.

P40022.label: has honouree agent of item
P40022.description: Relates an item to an agent who is honoured by an item.

P40023.label: has other agent associated with item (Deprecated)
P40023.description: Relates an item to an agent other than an owner or custodian who is associated with an item. (Deprecated)

P40024.label: has restorationist agent of item
P40024.description: Relates an item to an agent who is responsible for the set of technical, editorial, and intellectual procedures aimed at compensating for the degradation of an item by bringing it back to a state as close as possible to its original condition.

P40025.label: has dedicatee agent of item
P40025.description: Relates an item to an agent to whom an item is dedicated.

P40026.label: has custodial history of item
P40026.description: Relates an item to a record of previous ownership or custodianship of an item, including agent, place, and timespan.

P40028.label: has note on item
P40028.description: Relates an item to a broad unstructured description of one or more attributes of an item.

P40029.label: is held with
P40029.description: Relates an item to an item that is held in the same collection as an item.

P40030.label: is description of (item) (Deprecated)
P40030.description: Relates a work to an item described by a describing work. (Deprecated)

P40031.label: has equivalent item
P40031.description: Relates an item to an item that exemplifies a manifestation that embodies the same expression of a work.

P40032.label: is bound with
P40032.description: Relates an item to an item that is physically combined with an item to form a collection manifestation.

P40033.label: is analysis of (item) (Deprecated)
P40033.description: Relates a work to an item that has been examined to identify its components and their relations. (Deprecated)

P40034.label: is container of item
P40034.description: Relates an item to an item that is a discrete component of a larger item.

P40035.label: is on disc with item
P40035.description: Relates an item to an item that is contained on the same disc as an item.

P40036.label: is filmed with item
P40036.description: Relates an item to an item that is contained on the same microform as an item.

P40037.label: is evaluation of (item) (Deprecated)
P40037.description: Relates a work to an item that is examined or judged. (Deprecated)

P40040.label: is review of (item) (Deprecated)
P40040.description: Relates a work to an item used as the basis for a brief evaluation. (Deprecated)

P40041.label: is critique of (item) (Deprecated)
P40041.description: Relates a work to an item used as the basis for a critical evaluation. (Deprecated)

P40043.label: is commentary on (item) (Deprecated)
P40043.description: Relates a work to an item used as the basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes. (Deprecated)

P40046.label: has related item of item
P40046.description: Relates an item to an item that is associated with an item.

P40047.label: has restriction on access to item
P40047.description: Relates an item to a limitation placed on access to an item.

P40048.label: has restriction on use of item
P40048.description: Relates an item to a limitation placed on reproduction, publication, exhibition, etc., of an item.

P40049.label: has manifestation exemplified
P40049.description: Relates an item to a manifestation that is exemplified by an item.

P40050.label: has immediate source of acquisition of item
P40050.description: Relates an item to the circumstances under which an item is directly acquired, including a method, source, and date of acquisition.

P40052.label: has descriptive item relationship with (Deprecated)
P40052.description: Relates an item to a work that is a description of the item. (Deprecated)

P40061.label: is subject item of
P40061.description: Relates an item to a work that is about an item.

P40062.label: is item described by
P40062.description: Relates an item to a work that is a description of an item.

P40063.label: is item analysed in
P40063.description: Relates an item to a work that describes the structure and composition of an item.

P40064.label: is item commentary in
P40064.description: Relates an item to a work that is a set of explanatory or critical notes on an item.

P40065.label: is item critiqued in (Deprecated)
P40065.description: Relates an item to a work that is a critical evaluation of an item. (Deprecated)

P40066.label: is item evaluated in (Deprecated)
P40066.description: Relates an item to a work that examines or judges an item. (Deprecated)

P40067.label: is item reviewed in (Deprecated)
P40067.description: Relates an item to a work that is a brief evaluation of an item. (Deprecated)

P40068.label: has related RDA entity of item
P40068.description: Relates an item to an RDA entity that is associated with an item.

P40069.label: has related work of item
P40069.description: Relates an item to a work that is associated with an item.

P40070.label: has related expression of item
P40070.description: Relates an item to an expression that is associated with an item.

P40071.label: has related manifestation of item
P40071.description: Relates an item to a manifestation that is associated with an item.

P40072.label: has related agent of item
P40072.description: Relates an item to an agent who is associated with an item.

P40073.label: has related person of item
P40073.description: Relates an item to a person who is associated with an item.

P40074.label: has related family of item
P40074.description: Relates an item to a family who is associated with an item.

P40075.label: has related corporate body of item
P40075.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who is associated with an item.

P40076.label: has related collective agent of item
P40076.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who is associated with an item.

P40077.label: has related place of item
P40077.description: Relates an item to a place that is associated with an item.

P40078.label: has related timespan of item
P40078.description: Relates an item to a timespan that is associated with an item.

P40079.label: has related nomen of item
P40079.description: Relates an item to a nomen that is associated with an item.

P40080.label: has access point for item
P40080.description: Relates an item to a nomen that is an appellation of item in natural language that is taken from a vocabulary encoding scheme or is constructed using a string encoding scheme.

P40081.label: has appellation of item
P40081.description: Relates an item to a nomen that is used within a given scheme or context to refer to an item.

P40082.label: has title of item
P40082.description: Relates an item to a nomen that is an appellation of item in natural language and phrasing used in common discourse.

P40083.label: has authorized access point for item
P40083.description: Relates an item to a nomen that is an access point of item that is selected for preference in a specific vocabulary encoding scheme.

P40084.label: has variant access point for item
P40084.description: Relates an item to a nomen that is a n access point of item that is not selected for preference in a specific vocabulary encoding scheme.

P40085.label: has preferred title of item
P40085.description: Relates an item to a nomen that is a title of item that is selected for preference in a specific application or context.

P40086.label: has variant title of item
P40086.description: Relates an item to a nomen that is a title of item that is not selected for preference in a specific application or context.

P40087.label: has digital transfer of item
P40087.description: Relates an item to a manifestation in a digital format that results from the transfer of an item in another digital format.

P40088.label: has electronic reproduction of item
P40088.description: Relates an item to a manifestation in a digital format that is the result of the transfer of an item in analog format.

P40089.label: has facsimile of item
P40089.description: Relates an item to a manifestation that exactly reproduces an item that exemplifies another manifestation.

P40090.label: has preservation facsimile of item
P40090.description: Relates an item to a manifestation that consists of an exact reproduction of an item on preservation-quality media, such as acid-free permanent or archival paper.

P40091.label: is reprinted as item
P40091.description: Relates an item to a manifestation that is a reissue of an item that exemplifies another printed manifestation.

P40092.label: is reproduced as item
P40092.description: Relates an item to a manifestation that reproduces an item that exemplifies another manifestation.

P40093.label: has modifier agent
P40093.description: Relates an item to an agent that makes changes to an item without creating a new manifestation.

P40094.label: has binding of item
P40094.description: Relates an item to a work that is a binding of an item.

P40095.label: has related entity of item
P40095.description: Relates an item to an entity that is associated with an item.

P40096.label: has category of item
P40096.description: Relates an item to a type to which an item belongs.

P40097.label: has dedicatee person of item
P40097.description: Relates an item to a person to whom an item is dedicated.

P40098.label: has binder person
P40098.description: Relates an item to a person who binds an item.

P40099.label: has curator person (Deprecated)
P40099.description: Relates an item to a person who conceives or manages the aggregation of an item in an exhibition or collection. (Deprecated)

P40100.label: has illuminator person
P40100.description: Relates an item to a person who decorates a specific item using precious metals or colour, often with elaborate designs and motifs.

P40101.label: has current owner person
P40101.description: Relates an item to a person who has current legal possession of an item.

P40102.label: has former owner person
P40102.description: Relates an item to a person who has former legal possession of an item.

P40103.label: has custodian person
P40103.description: Relates an item to a person who has legal custody of an item.

P40104.label: has owner person
P40104.description: Relates an item to a person who has current or former legal possession of an item.

P40105.label: has collector person (Deprecated)
P40105.description: Relates an item to a person who is a curator who brings together items from various sources that are arranged, described, or catalogued as a collection. (Deprecated)

P40106.label: has collection registrar person (Deprecated)
P40106.description: Relates an item to a person who is a curator who lists or inventories items in a collection aggregate. (Deprecated)

P40107.label: has depositor person
P40107.description: Relates an item to a person who is a current owner of an item who deposits the item into the custody of another agent without transferring ownership.

P40108.label: has donor person
P40108.description: Relates an item to a person who is a former owner of an item who donates the item to another owner.

P40109.label: has seller person
P40109.description: Relates an item to a person who is a former owner of an item who sells the item to another owner.

P40110.label: has honouree person of item
P40110.description: Relates an item to a person who is honoured by an item.

P40111.label: has restorationist person of item
P40111.description: Relates an item to a person who is responsible for the set of technical, editorial, and intellectual procedures aimed at compensating for the degradation of an item by bringing it back to a state as close as possible to its original condition.

P40112.label: has modifier person
P40112.description: Relates an item to a person that makes changes to an item without creating a new manifestation.

P40113.label: has dedicatee collective agent of item
P40113.description: Relates an item to a collective agent to whom an item is dedicated.

P40114.label: has binder collective agent
P40114.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who binds an item.

P40115.label: has curator collective agent (Deprecated)
P40115.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who conceives or manages the aggregation of an item in an exhibition or collection. (Deprecated)

P40116.label: has illuminator collective agent
P40116.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who decorates a specific item using precious metals or colour, often with elaborate designs and motifs.

P40117.label: has current owner collective agent
P40117.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who has current legal possession of an item.

P40118.label: has former owner collective agent
P40118.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who has former legal possession of an item.

P40119.label: has custodian collective agent
P40119.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who has legal custody of an item.

P40120.label: has owner collective agent
P40120.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who has current or former legal possession of an item.

P40121.label: has collector collective agent (Deprecated)
P40121.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who is a curator who brings together items from various sources that are arranged, described, or catalogued as a collection. (Deprecated)

P40122.label: has collection registrar collective agent (Deprecated)
P40122.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who is a curator who lists or inventories items in a collection aggregate. (Deprecated)

P40123.label: has depositor collective agent
P40123.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who is a current owner of an item who deposits the item into the custody of another agent without transferring ownership.

P40124.label: has donor collective agent
P40124.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who is a former owner of an item who donates the item to another owner.

P40125.label: has seller collective agent
P40125.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who is a former owner of an item who sells the item to another owner.

P40126.label: has honouree collective agent of item
P40126.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who is honoured by an item.

P40127.label: has restorationist collective agent of item
P40127.description: Relates an item to a collective agent who is responsible for the set of technical, editorial, and intellectual procedures aimed at compensating for the degradation of an item by bringing it back to a state as close as possible to its original condition.

P40128.label: has modifier collective agent
P40128.description: Relates an item to a collective agent that makes changes to an item without creating a new manifestation.

P40129.label: has dedicatee corporate body of item
P40129.description: Relates an item to a corporate body to whom an item is dedicated.

P40130.label: has binder corporate body
P40130.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who binds an item.

P40131.label: has curator corporate body (Deprecated)
P40131.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who conceives or manages the aggregation of an item in an exhibition or collection. (Deprecated)

P40132.label: has illuminator corporate body
P40132.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who decorates a specific item using precious metals or colour, often with elaborate designs and motifs.

P40133.label: has current owner corporate body
P40133.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who has current legal possession of an item.

P40134.label: has former owner corporate body
P40134.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who has former legal possession of an item.

P40135.label: has custodian corporate body
P40135.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who has legal custody of an item.

P40136.label: has owner corporate body
P40136.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who has current or former legal possession of an item.

P40138.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who is a curator who lists or inventories items in a collection aggregate. (Deprecated)

P40140.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who is a former owner of an item who donates the item to another owner.

P40141.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who is a former owner of an item who sells the item to another owner.

P40142.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who is honoured by an item.

P40143.description: Relates an item to a corporate body who is responsible for the set of technical, editorial, and intellectual procedures aimed at compensating for the degradation of an item by bringing it back to a state as close as possible to its original condition.

P40144.label: has modifier corporate body
P40144.description: Relates an item to a corporate body that makes changes to an item without creating a new manifestation.

P40145.label: has dedicatee family of item
P40145.description: Relates an item to a family to whom an item is dedicated.

P40146.label: has binder family
P40146.description: Relates an item to a family who binds an item.

P40147.label: has curator family (Deprecated)
P40147.description: Relates an item to a family who conceives or manages the aggregation of an item in an exhibition or collection. (Deprecated)

P40148.label: has illuminator family
P40148.description: Relates an item to a family who decorates a specific item using precious metals or colour, often with elaborate designs and motifs.

P40149.label: has current owner family
P40149.description: Relates an item to a family who has current legal possession of an item.

P40150.label: has former owner family
P40150.description: Relates an item to a family who has former legal possession of an item.

P40151.label: has custodian family
P40151.description: Relates an item to a family who has legal custody of an item.

P40152.label: has owner family
P40152.description: Relates an item to a family who has current or former legal possession of an item.

P40153.label: has collector family (Deprecated)
P40153.description: Relates an item to a family who is a curator who brings together items from various sources that are arranged, described, or catalogued as a collection. (Deprecated)

P40154.label: has collection registrar family (Deprecated)
P40154.description: Relates an item to a family who is a curator who lists or inventories items in a collection aggregate. (Deprecated)

P40156.label: has donor family
P40156.description: Relates an item to a family who is a former owner of an item who donates the item to another owner.

P40157.label: has seller family
P40157.description: Relates an item to a family who is a former owner of an item who sells the item to another owner.

P40158.description: Relates an item to a family who is honoured by an item.

P40160.label: has modifier family
P40160.description: Relates an item to a family that makes changes to an item without creating a new manifestation.

P40161.label: is holding of
P40161.description: Relates an item to a manifestation of a collection work that includes the item.

P40162.label: has location of item
P40162.description: Relates an item to a place where an item is held, stored, or made available for access.

P40163.label: is on manifestation with
P40163.description: Relates an item to an item that is reproduced on the same manifestation as an item.

P40164.label: is item described with metadata by
P40164.description: Relates an item to a work that is a metadata work for an item.
